focusAreas.headline: Where we apply the approach
focusAreas.intro: Choose the service area where you need support. We bring the same disciplined approach to enterprise architecture and process intelligence for governed innovation across each domain.

areas.title: Process Intelligence & Continuous Improvement
areas.tagline: Make process behavior visible. Build a repeatable improvement and innovation loop.
areas.description: Establish data-driven improvement for business-critical SAP processes using process mining, event analytics, and BI tools. Move from intuition to evidence for where to innovate.
outcomes: Clear visibility into actual process execution
Prioritized improvement backlog (including automation and AI candidates)
Simple KPIs and monitoring for ongoing control
areas.tools: SAP Signavio, SAP Business Data Cloud, Databricks, BI platforms

areas.title: SAP Modernization & Clean-Core Discovery
areas.tagline: Reduce complexity. Safeguard your SAP investment. Create room for governed innovation.
areas.description: Support SAP transformations by identifying and eliminating unnecessary customizations using the Plug and Gain approach. Create pragmatic clean-core roadmaps that enable faster upgrades and innovation.
outcomes: Clear view of custom code and process deviations using Plug and Gain analysis
Process House view with Best-Run Scores and transaction analysis
Faster upgrade and governed innovation cycles
areas.tools: SAP S/4HANA, SAP BTP, Signavio Process Insights & Process Intelligence (Plug and Gain), LeanIX, Business Data Cloud

areas.title: Enterprise Architecture & Transformation Governance
areas.tagline: Structure for complex programs. Clarity for sustainable innovation—without bureaucracy.
areas.description: Provide architecture governance that strengthens delivery rather than slowing it down. Clear principles, practical guidance, and integration into your transformation approach.
outcomes: Clear architecture principles and decision guardrails

areas.title: AI Governance & AI Agent Governance Foundations
areas.tagline: Enable AI-driven innovation with accountability and control.
areas.description: Establish governance for AI and GenAI use cases while maintaining oversight and trust. Prepare for autonomous and semi-autonomous AI agents with proper guardrails.
outcomes: Clear AI governance principles and decision criteria
Integration of controls into ML and data platforms
Guardrails for increasing AI autonomy and agent-driven innovation
areas.tools: Databricks (MLflow, Unity Catalog), data platforms, existing compliance frameworks

offers.headline: Ways to work together
offers.intro: Choose the engagement format that matches your urgency and capacity. Each format applies across all service areas and is designed to create measurable progress, support governed innovation, and strengthen internal capability.

items.title: Discovery Sprint
items.subtitle: 4–6 weeks
items.description: Fast diagnostic to identify what matters most. Delivered as one tight engagement with clear outputs: current-state view, prioritized opportunities, and a roadmap for next steps.
items.bestWhen: Best when you need clarity fast on where to focus innovation and improvement

items.title: Embedded Initiative Leadership
items.subtitle: 0.5–2 days per week, 3–12 months
items.description: Fractional leadership embedded in your team to own delivery of a specific initiative—whether process transformation, SAP clean-core, or AI governance rollout.
items.bestWhen: Best when you need delivery support inside the team for high-stakes improvement and innovation initiatives

items.title: Continuous Improvement Operating System
items.subtitle: Ongoing partnership
items.description: Build internal capability to run process intelligence, portfolio management, and governed delivery as a permanent operating rhythm—not a one-time project.
items.bestWhen: Best when you want improvement and innovation to become repeatable

whyValment.closingLine: Engage for a sprint, embed for delivery, or build the operating system for continuous improvement.
